channel.title: When did this happen?
channel.description:
[img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/5642/wtfdk.png[/img]
When did this happen? It looks like loads of rowntree's randoms floating round on my screen. Anyone else found any weird things like this recently?

item.title: When did this happen?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:11, topic:426869”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=529567.msg3865462#msg3865462 date=1324963011]

Random events I guess now have a huge range of colors they can turn into but regular items I think they just have a range and if jagex made it any bigger the whole map might be spazzin out or something

the map? who said anything about the map.

either im mistaken or drub is a fag.
[/quote]
Hmm… you really are an asshole D:

but I did hear that if they made the range any bigger the map woulda started spazzing out[/quote]

ily tho <3

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

They use green aswell.

Random events I guess now have a huge range of colors they can turn into but regular items I think they just have a range and if jagex made it any bigger the whole map might be spazzin out or something
[/quote]

the map? who said anything about the map.

either im mistaken or drub is a fag.[/quote]
Hmm… you really are an asshole D:

but I did hear that if they made the range any bigger the map woulda started spazzing out

Random events I guess now have a huge range of colors they can turn into but regular items I think they just have a range and if jagex made it any bigger the whole map might be spazzin out or something
[/quote]

either im mistaken or drub is a fag.[/quote]He means if the color range was any bigger, it would look weird as shit.

[/quote]I believed they changed it due to color bots. (Source is Jrub)[/quote]
Sounds about right and interesting on how they did this.
